title: You will not know when to look first.
text:
Recommended by a friend. So pleased we went along.
The christmas decorations were fantastic.
All the staff were dressed up like Elves.
Its a childs dream for adults to enjoy.
The portion sizes are HUGE.
I recommend the red velvet cake. It melted in my mouth.
So yummy but we left with tummy aches cause we ate too much!

title: Impressive
text:
Super impressive structure.
Start at the top and work your way down.
Free for EU students. Discount in November for everyone else.
Go during the week avoid school holidays.

title: Shame about the locals
text:
Plaka has some great sites. The buildings are interesting, unfortunately most have grafiti all over them.
Lots of tourist shops selling exactly the same stock, all personally handmade by their children! !
The shop keeps aside the local people are ignorant self occupied and have no sense of personal space.
